post.summary: Add a new image for a recipe.

delete.description: Removes a specific image from a recipe identified by its `recipeId` and `imageId`. The image will be deleted from the recipe and the associated cache will be invalidated.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the recipe from which the image will be removed.

parameters.description: The unique identifier of the image to be removed from the recipe.

get.summary: Fetch all available regions.

parameters.description: Filter regions by nation.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Specify the field to sort by (e.g., "name"). Defaults to sorting by region name.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of regions to fetch per page. Defaults to 10, max is 100.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number of results to retrieve. Defaults to 1.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search for regions by name or other criteria.
